title: 30% Off Storewide
description: Get 30% off all items in Etude House (minimum spending of $50). Simply show your voucher code to our staff!

title: $5 Off Any Ride
description: Redeem to get $5 off any Grab ride (besides Grabhitch)! Key in your voucher code under "Promo code" in our Grab application to redeem. T&Cs apply.

title: $10 Off Any Ride
description: Redeem to get $10 off any Grab ride (besides Grabhitch)! Key in your voucher code under "Promo code" in our Grab application to redeem. T&Cs apply.

title: 30% Off Rides
description: Redeem to get 30% off your Gojek ride (capped at $5)! Key in your voucher code under "Promo code" before booking a ride to redeem. T&Cs apply.

title: JBL Flip 4 Speaker
description: Get our newest JBL Flip 4 Speaker! Redeem it at any of our Challenger outlets with your voucher code.

title: $5 Voucher
description: $5 4FINGERS CRISPY CHICKEN voucher when you flash this in-store! Valid at all 4FINGERS Singapore outlets only. Please flash this e-voucher code upon payment.

title: $5 Off Credit Fee
description: Start investing with a waived $5 fee credit with Singapore's most intelligent robot-advisor. How to use this reward? 1: Go to https://www.stashaway.sg/redeem and sign up or login. 2: Once signed up redeem your code under Account -> Settings -> Promotions by keying in your voucher code. 3: Enjoy discount and watch your money grow! T&Cs apply.

title: 5,000 STAR$
description: Redeem 5,000 STAR$ (worth a $5 CapitaVoucher)! Valid for all users and expires on 30 Nov 2020.

title: Wonderboom 2 Wireless Speaker
description: Exchange your points for a Free Wonderboom 2 Wireless Speaker worth $139! Only available in Deep Space Black colour.

title: Samsung Galaxy S10e 128GB
description: Get a free Samsung Galaxy S10e 128GB. Available only in Singapore.

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds
description: Get a free Samsung galaxy buds. Available only in Singapore.

title: 12% Storewide Discount
description: Enjoy 12% off storewide when you check out your local Althea cart!Discount does not apply on Althea Collection and A'Bloom products.
